title: DDFP 461: Icing v. Gravy Debate with the Lions' Geoff Schwartz & Ross Tucker
itunes:title: DDFP 461: Icing v. Gravy Debate with the Lions' Geoff Schwartz & Ross Tucker
description:
Shek is joined in Studio 66 with Handsome Hank & guest Ross Tucker as they remember the brilliance of Muhammad Ali's life.  Plus, Lions guard Geoff Schwartz joins the show to debate Icing v. Gravy, the Detroit Lions position in the NFC North hierarchy & finish with a discussion on the latest episode of “Game of Thrones.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
